body_html:
Hi, now it builds using the driver you said on a fresh install but i cannot use all the cards, just the first, even if clinfo and comptecpp_info report all of them. Please see this link, i asked the question on stackoverflow:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52864399/multiple-amd-gpus-with-tensorflow-and-opencl-on-ubuntu-16-04
Any ideas how to address this issue?
body_text:

body:
Hi, now it builds using the driver you said on a fresh install but i cannot use all the cards, just the first, even if clinfo and comptecpp_info report all of them. Please see this link, i asked the question on stackoverflow:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52864399/multiple-amd-gpus-with-tensorflow-and-opencl-on-ubuntu-16-04
Any ideas how to address this issue?
